actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Select Committee on Intelligence.
Select Committee on Intelligence. Hearings held.
Select Committee on Intelligence. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Feinstein, Select Committee on Intelligence, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 43. Subject to nominee's commitment to respond to requests to appear and testify before any duly constituted committee of the Senate.
Motion to proceed to consideration of nomination made in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
By unanimous consent agreement, debate to resume on 3/7/13.
By unanimous consent agreement, vote on cloture motion and if cloture invoked on nomination.
Cloture invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 81
Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 63
name: John Owen Brennan
nominee: John Owen Brennan, of Virginia, to be Director of the Central Intelligence Agency
position: Director of the Central Intelligence Agency
